name: Drop Coalescence Simulation
description: Axisymmetric VOF simulation of water drop coalescence into a flat pool, studying spreading behavior and energy budgets. Built on the Basilisk CFD framework with adaptive mesh refinement.

name: FollowMe
description: iOS app for real-time person tracking with BLE servo control. Uses on-device ML via Apple Vision to detect and follow a speaker, driving a physical pan stage for automated camera tracking.

name: Memento Mori
description: Philosophical web app visualizing your lifespan as a grid of weeks. A perspective tool for reflecting on how you spend your time.
